EMPLOYEES_DESC: Employees information who can work in the administration portal
SERVICES_DESC: The Permitted services that could be achived.Example: transporation service,assembly.. etc
VEHCILE_SIZE_DESC: The size of the vehciles that used for transportation
SUBSCRIPTION_MGMT_DESC: To activate Or deactivate a subscription
ITEM_SERVICES_DESC: Services that colud be done for an item. Example: a Wardrobe coluld be dismantled or assembled, while a lamb can be transported only.
PAY_METHOD_DESC: The methods that customer could use for payment. Example:VISA,CASH,Transfer...etc
USER_ACCOUNT_DESC: The employees wh can access the current system'The administration portal'.To create a username and password for a user to access this portal
CURRENCY_DESC: List of allowed currencies. Each service provider must specify the currency for his transactions.
